abstract: Winning is the point, of course, but there is no shame in finishing second in a Breeders' Cup race.
snippet: Winning is the point, of course, but there is no shame in finishing second in a Breeders' Cup race.
lead_paragraph: Winning is the point, of course, but there is no shame in finishing second in a Breeders' Cup race. Zenyatta's whisker-thin loss to Blame in last year's Classic certainly is a case in point. It did nothing to diminish significantly her stature as a champion and her eventual designation as Horse of the Year.

headline.main: A Breeders' Cup Bridesmaid Finds Her Best Stride
